stepTitle: Consider the $$65.0$$ kg ice skater being pushed by two others shown in Figure $$5.19$$. Find the magnitude of $$F_{tot}$$ (in Newtons, rounded to $$2$$ decimals), the total force exerted on her by the others, given that the magnitudes F1 and F2 are $$26.4$$ N and $$18.6$$ N, respectively.
